application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: REAR GARDENT1 Silk tassel bush - (Garrya elliptica) - 30% Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by approx. 2-3m to tidy and contain and retain furnishing growth - Final height = 4m and final spread = 4m.T2 Weeping Silver Pear (Pyrus salicifolia pendula) - Trim / reduce to tidy and contain. Remove 1-1.5m. Final height = 3m and final spread = 3m.	T3 Maidenhair Tree (Ginkgo biloba) - Crown Reduction - Reduce height and spread by up to 3m. Reduce slightly harder where overhanging neighbours at No.47. Final height 12m and spread 7m. T4 Monterey Cypress (Cupressus macrocarpa) - 30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approx. 2-3m to tidy and contain. Final height = 14m and final spread = 8m.
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
